title: He Keep Sharing His Toys
itunes:title: He Keep Sharing His Toys
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 44 year single woman and I’m in a long-distance relationship with a man that lives with two females. They have all been friends for years so he’s allowed them to stay with him after they got divorced. The first woman moved in about 4 months ago and she’s not even working and claims she’s very depressed, so she lies around the house all day in a robe and a bonnet...................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
